name: Monster Camp
description:
In Monster Camp, you can collect thousands of cute monsters and fight with them. With a complete different way of playing, the process of collecting would be interesting and challenging!

Evolution
You can build your team with cute monsters. The Skills are not only powerful but so beautiful. You need to build a powerful team to pass the dangerous dungeons.

Dungeons
Many dangerous evil monsters are hiding here, you need to watch it out. Choose the countered type of monsters as your team will make it easier to pass the dungeons

Various Rewards
Any success is rewarded here. You can receive great rewards once you clean the dungeons or complete some achievements.

The game is free to download! Join us now!
